name: Aim Trainer X
description:
Aim Trainer X is an aim training video game/ software that help's the player improve his reaction skill, aiming and reflexes.

Modes:

Aim Trainer X comes with 5 different modes:

-Challenge- A limited amount of time is given where at the end of the round you see your stats and performance.
-Sniper- Look through a snipers scope and do your best to hit the targets.
-Precision- The player is given small targets to hit with little room for mistakes.
-Doubleshot- With two targets coming up on the screen the player has to act fast with a flick after the first shot to hit both targets.
-Reflex- The players reflexes are tested with a red flashing screen challenging him to click as fast as possible

Stats:


The stats menu gives you a look on your performance from your last round and your all time performance.

The stats menu offers the average percentage of shots hit, all shot fired, all shots hit and the average reaction time.
